scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:dts && npm run build:sdk
scripts.build:dts: node scripts/build-dts && tsc --noEmit --target ESNEXT --module commonjs --experimentalDecorators tests/require/index-release
scripts.check: npm run check:config && npm run check:compiler && tsc --noEmit --target ESNEXT --module commonjs --experimentalDecorators tests/require/index
scripts.test: npm run test:parser && npm run test:compiler && npm run test:packages && npm run test:extension
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm test && npm run build && npm test
scripts.all: npm run check && npm run make
scripts.docs: typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig-docs.json --mode modules --name "AssemblyScript Compiler API" --out ./docs/api --ignoreCompilerErrors --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --excludeExternals --exclude **/std/** --includeDeclarations --readme src/README.md
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.asbuild:untouched: node bin/asc src/glue/wasm/index.ts src/index.ts -t out/assemblyscript.untouched.wat -b out/assemblyscript.untouched.wasm -d out/assemblyscript.d.ts --validate --debug --measure
scripts.asbuild:optimized: node bin/asc src/glue/wasm/index.ts src/index.ts -t out/assemblyscript.optimized.wat -b out/assemblyscript.optimized.wasm -O3 --validate --measure
